content.en: Vibrational Frequency Analysis: Scientists have used various algorithms to investigate the effects of different substituents on the vibrational frequencies of certain compounds, such as 2,6-dibromo-4-nitroaniline and 2-(methylthio)aniline. They have also compared the accuracy of different computational methods, such as Hartree-Fock and density functional theory (DFT), in predicting vibrational frequencies of compounds like 1-amino-5-benzoyl-4-phenylpyrimidin-2(1H). These algorithms, such as DFT with the B3LYP method, Gaussian 03 Revision C.02, and ab initio calculations, have been used to optimize geometries, predict infrared spectra, and analyze spectroscopic properties of various compounds.
content.da: Vibrationsfrekvensanalyse: Forskere har brugt forskellige algoritmer til at undersøge effekterne af forskellige substituenter på vibrationsfrekvenserne af bestemte forbindelser, såsom 2,6-dibromo-4-nitroanilin og 2-(methylthio)anilin. De har også sammenlignet nøjagtigheden af forskellige beregningsmetoder, såsom Hartree-Fock og densitetsfunktionelteori (DFT), i at forudsige vibrationsfrekvenser af forbindelser som 1-amino-5-benzoyl-4-fenylpyrimidin-2(1H). Disse algoritmer, såsom DFT med B3LYP-metoden, Gaussian 03 Revision C.02, og ab initio-beregninger, er blevet brugt til at optimere geometrier, forudsige infrarøde spektre og analysere spektroskopiske egenskaber af forskellige forbindelser.
